verses.verse: בְּ֭נִי <WH1121> My son שְׁמֹ֣ר <WH8104> keep אֲמָרָ֑י <WH561> my words וּ֝מִצְוֹתַ֗י <WH4687> my commandments תִּצְפֹּ֥ן <WH6845> and lay up אִתָּֽךְ׃ <WH854> within
שְׁמֹ֣ר <WH8104> Keep מִצְוֹתַ֣י <WH4687> my commandments וֶחְיֵ֑ה <WH2421> and live וְ֝תוֹרָתִ֗י <WH8451> and my law כְּאִישׁ֥וֹן <WH380> as the apple עֵינֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5869> of thine eye
קָשְׁרֵ֥ם <WH7194> Bind עַל־ <WH5921> on אֶצְבְּעֹתֶ֑יךָ <WH676> them upon thy fingers כָּ֝תְבֵ֗ם <WH3789> write עַל־ <WH5921> on ל֥וּחַ <WH3871> them upon the table לִבֶּֽךָ׃ <WH3820> of thine heart

אֱמֹ֣ר <WH559> Say לַֽ֭חָכְמָה <WH2451> unto wisdom אֲחֹ֣תִי <WH269> Thou [art] my sister אָ֑תְּ <WH859> you וּ֝מֹדָ֗ע <WH4129> [thy] kinswoman לַבִּינָ֥ה <WH998> understanding תִקְרָֽא׃ <WH7121> and call

לִ֭שְׁמָרְךָ <WH8104> That they may keep מֵאִשָּׁ֣ה <WH802> woman זָרָ֑ה <WH2114> thee from the strange מִ֝נָּכְרִיָּ֗ה <WH5237> from the stranger אֲמָרֶ֥יהָ <WH561> with her words הֶחֱלִֽיקָה׃ <WH2505> [which] flattereth
כִּ֭י <WH3588> at בְּחַלּ֣וֹן <WH2474> For at the window בֵּיתִ֑י <WH1004> of my house בְּעַ֖ד <WH1157> through אֶשְׁנַבִּ֣י <WH822> through my casement נִשְׁקָֽפְתִּי׃ <WH8259> I looked

וָאֵ֤רֶא <WH7200> And beheld בַפְּתָאיִ֗ם <WH6612> among the simple ones אָ֘בִ֤ינָה <WH995> I discerned בַבָּנִ֗ים <WH1121> among the youths נַ֣עַר <WH5288> a young man חֲסַר־ <WH2638> void לֵֽב׃ <WH3820> of understanding

עֹבֵ֣ר <WH5674> Passing through בַּ֭שּׁוּק <WH7784> the street אֵ֣צֶל <WH681> near פִּנָּ֑הּ <WH6438> her corner וְדֶ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> the way בֵּיתָ֣הּ <WH1004> to her house יִצְעָֽד׃ <WH6805> and he went
בְּנֶֽשֶׁף־ <WH5399> In the twilight בְּעֶ֥רֶב <WH6153> day י֑וֹם <WH3117> In בְּאִישׁ֥וֹן <WH380> in the black לַ֝֗יְלָה <WH3915> night וַאֲפֵלָֽה׃ <WH653> and dark

וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> and behold אִ֭שָּׁה <WH802> him a woman לִקְרָאת֑וֹ <WH7125> And behold there met שִׁ֥ית <WH7897> [with] the attire ז֝וֹנָ֗ה <WH2181> of an harlot וּנְצֻ֥רַת <WH5341> and subtil לֵֽב׃ <WH3820> of heart
הֹמִיָּ֣ה <WH1993> (She [is] loud הִ֣יא <WH1931> he וְסֹרָ֑רֶת <WH5637> and stubborn בְּ֝בֵיתָ֗הּ <WH1004> not in her house לֹא־ <WH3808> not יִשְׁכְּנ֥וּ <WH7931> abide רַגְלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH7272> her feet

פַּ֤עַם ׀ <WH6471> Now בַּח֗וּץ <WH2351> [is she] without פַּ֥עַם <WH6471> now בָּרְחֹב֑וֹת <WH7339> in the streets וְאֵ֖צֶל <WH681> at כָּל־ <WH3605> every פִּנָּ֣ה <WH6438> corner תֶאֱרֹֽב׃ <WH693> and lieth in wait
וְהֶחֱזִ֣יקָה <WH2388> So she caught בּ֭וֹ וְנָ֣שְׁקָה־ <WH5401> him and kissed לּ֑וֹ הֵעֵ֥זָה <WH5810> him [and] with an impudent פָ֝נֶ֗יהָ <WH6440> face וַתֹּ֣אמַר <WH559> said לֽוֹ׃
זִבְחֵ֣י <WH2077> offerings שְׁלָמִ֣ים <WH8002> [I have] peace עָלָ֑י <WH5921> was due הַ֝יּ֗וֹם <WH3117> with me this day שִׁלַּ֥מְתִּי <WH7999> have I payed נְדָרָֽי׃ <WH5088> my vows

עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֭ן <WH3651> after that יָצָ֣אתִי <WH3318> Therefore came I forth לִקְרָאתֶ֑ךָ <WH7125> to meet לְשַׁחֵ֥ר <WH7836> thee diligently to seek פָּ֝נֶ֗יךָ <WH6440> thy face וָאֶמְצָאֶֽךָּ׃ <WH4672> and I have found

מַ֭רְבַדִּים <WH4765> with coverings רָבַ֣דְתִּי <WH7234> I have decked עַרְשִׂ֑י <WH6210> my bed חֲ֝טֻב֗וֹת <WH2405> of tapestry with carved אֵט֥וּן <WH330> [works] with fine linen מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt
נַ֥פְתִּי <WH5130> I have perfumed מִשְׁכָּבִ֑י <WH4904> my bed מֹ֥ר <WH4753> with myrrh אֲ֝הָלִ֗ים <WH174> aloes וְקִנָּמֽוֹן׃ <WH7076> and cinnamon

לְכָ֤ה <WH1980> Come נִרְוֶ֣ה <WH7301> let us take our fill דֹ֭דִים <WH1730> of love עַד־ <WH5704> until הַבֹּ֑קֶר <WH1242> until the morning נִ֝תְעַלְּסָ֗ה <WH5965> let us solace בָּאֳהָבִֽים׃ <WH159> ourselves with loves
כִּ֤י <WH3588> for אֵ֣ין <WH369> for הָאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> For the goodman בְּבֵית֑וֹ <WH1004> [is] not at home הָ֝לַ֗ךְ <WH1980> he is gone בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> journey מֵרָחֽוֹק׃ <WH7350> a long

צְֽרוֹר־ <WH6872> a bag הַ֭כֶּסֶף <WH3701> of money לָקַ֣ח <WH3947> He hath taken בְּיָד֑וֹ <WH3027> with him לְי֥וֹם <WH3117> at the day הַ֝כֵּ֗סֶא <WH3677> appointed יָבֹ֥א <WH935> [and] will come בֵיתֽוֹ׃ <WH1004> home

הִ֭טַּתּוּ <WH5186> she caused him to yield בְּרֹ֣ב <WH7230> With her much לִקְחָ֑הּ <WH3948> fair speech בְּחֵ֥לֶק <WH2506> with the flattering שְׂ֝פָתֶ֗יהָ <WH8193> of her lips תַּדִּיחֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH5080> she forced

ה֤וֹלֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> He goeth אַחֲרֶ֗יהָ <WH310> after פִּ֫תְאֹ֥ם <WH6597> her straightway כְּ֭שׁוֹר <WH7794> as an ox אֶל־ <WH413> to טָ֣בַח <WH2874> to the slaughter יָב֑וֹא <WH935> goeth וּ֝כְעֶ֗כֶס <WH5914> of the stocks אֶל־ <WH413> to מוּסַ֥ר <WH4148> to the correction אֱוִֽיל׃ <WH191> or as a fool

עַ֤ד <WH5704> Until יְפַלַּ֪ח <WH6398> strike חֵ֡ץ <WH2671> Till a dart כְּֽבֵד֗וֹ <WH3516> through his liver כְּמַהֵ֣ר <WH4116> hasteth צִפּ֣וֹר <WH6833> as a bird אֶל־ <WH413> to פָּ֑ח <WH6341> to the snare וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> does not יָ֝דַ֗ע <WH3045> and knoweth כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that it בְנַפְשׁ֥וֹ <WH5315> not that it [is] for his life הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he פ

וְעַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> Now בָ֭נִים <WH1121> unto me now therefore O ye children שִׁמְעוּ־ <WH8085> Hearken לִ֑י וְ֝הַקְשִׁ֗יבוּ <WH7181> and attend לְאִמְרֵי־ <WH561> to the words פִֽי׃ <WH6310> of my mouth

אַל־ <WH408> nay יֵ֣שְׂטְ <WH7847> decline אֶל־ <WH413> to her דְּרָכֶ֣יהָ <WH1870> to her ways לִבֶּ֑ךָ <WH3820> Let not thine heart אַל־ <WH408> not תֵּ֝תַע <WH8582> go not astray בִּנְתִיבוֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5410> in her paths

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For רַבִּ֣ים <WH7227> many חֲלָלִ֣ים <WH2491> wounded הִפִּ֑ילָה <WH5307> For she hath cast down וַ֝עֲצֻמִ֗ים <WH6099> yea many strong כָּל־ <WH3605> are all הֲרֻגֶֽיהָ׃ <WH2026> [men] have been slain
דַּרְכֵ֣י <WH1870> [is] the way שְׁא֣וֹל <WH7585> to hell בֵּיתָ֑הּ <WH1004> Her house יֹ֝רְד֗וֹת <WH3381> going down אֶל־ <WH413> to חַדְרֵי־ <WH2315> to the chambers מָֽוֶת׃ <WH4194> of death פ
